answers.answer: How far along are you?? There are tons of medications you can be put on,to regulate your diabetes and blood pressure during pregnancy, as long as you make sure to tell your OB that you have these, I wouldn't be too worried, 39 is NOT that old, and MUCH older women have given birth to completely healthy babies! Relax and enjoy your pregnancy, CONGRATS! :]

question: I HAVE DIABETES AND HIGHBLOOD PRESURE AND ALSO TAKE SYC MEDS FOR POST TRAMETIC STRESS DISORDER FROM THE USAF SO I'M ON LOTS OF MEDS AND I;M OLDER NOW I'M SCARED THAT I WILL HAVE A UNHEALTHY BABY AND I AM HAVING SOME CRAMPS NOT TO MUCH BUT NOW I HAVE A BROWN COLOR DISCHARGE SO AM I HAVING A MISSCARAGE ?
title: 39 AND HIGH RISK PREGNANCY SCARED!
